text: The WAGS LA star Nicole Williams tied the knot with her fiance Larry English at the Montage Laguna Beach this Friday. They told E! News that they are full of love right now and that it was an incredible journey getting here as that they couldn â€™ t be happier. They are both very overjoyed and excited abut the future, and we also wish them all the best. The couple got engaged in the season two finale of the hit E! series this past September. William was on a trip together with her friends when English surprised her proposing with the most beautiful Ritani ring.
